39 using namespace std;
40 using namespace Mutation::Utilities::Config;
41 
42 namespace Mutation {
43  namespace GasSurfaceInteraction {
44 
45 class GSIReactionAblation : public GSIReaction
46 {
47 public:
48  GSIReactionAblation(ARGS args)
49  : GSIReaction(args)
50  {
51  assert(args.s_iter_reaction->tag() == "reaction");
52 
53  args.s_iter_reaction->getAttribute(
54  "formula", m_formula,
55  errorNoFormulainReaction());
56 
57  parseFormula(
58  args.s_thermo,
59  args.s_surf_state,
60  *(args.s_iter_reaction));
61 
62  const Mutation::Utilities::IO::XmlElement& node_rate_law =
63  *(args.s_iter_reaction->begin());
64 
65  DataGSIRateLaw data_gsi_rate_law = {
66  args.s_thermo,
67  args.s_transport,
68  node_rate_law,
69  m_reactants,
70  m_products };
71 
72  mp_rate_law = Factory<GSIRateLaw>::create(
73  node_rate_law.tag(), data_gsi_rate_law);
74 
75  if (mp_rate_law == NULL) {
76  args.s_iter_reaction->parseError(
77  "A rate law must be provided for this reaction!");
78  }
79 
80  // Check for charge and mass conservation
81  const size_t ne = args.s_thermo.nElements();
82  vector<int> v_sums(ne);
83  std::fill(v_sums.begin(), v_sums.end(), 0);
84  // Reactants
85  for (int ir = 0; ir < m_reactants.size(); ++ir) {
86  for (int kr = 0; kr < ne; ++kr)
87  v_sums[kr] +=
88  args.s_thermo.elementMatrix()(m_reactants[ir], kr);
89  }
90  // Reactants in the surface phase
91  for (int ir = 0; ir < m_reactants_surf.size(); ++ir){
92  for (int kr = 0; kr < ne; ++kr) {
93  v_sums[kr] += args.s_thermo.elementMatrix()(
94  args.s_surf_state.surfaceProps().surfaceToGasIndex(
95  m_reactants_surf[ir]), kr);
96  }
97  }
98  // Products
99  for (int ip = 0; ip < m_products.size(); ++ip)
100  for (int kp = 0; kp < ne; ++kp)
101  v_sums[kp] -=
102  args.s_thermo.elementMatrix()(m_products[ip], kp);
103  // Products in the surface phase
104  for (int ip = 0; ip < m_products_surf.size(); ++ip){
105  for (int kp = 0; kp < ne; ++kp) {
106  v_sums[kp] -= args.s_thermo.elementMatrix()(
107  args.s_surf_state.surfaceProps().surfaceToGasIndex(
108  m_products_surf[ip]), kp);
109  }
110  }
111 
112  for (int i = 0; i < ne; ++i)
113  m_conserves &= (v_sums[i] == 0);
114 
115  if (m_conserves == false)
116  throw InvalidInputError("formula", m_formula)
117  << "Reaction " << m_formula
118  << " does not conserve charge or mass.";
119  }
120 
121 //==============================================================================
122 
123  ~GSIReactionAblation(){
124  if (mp_rate_law != NULL){ delete mp_rate_law; }
125  }
126 
127 //==============================================================================
128 
129  void parseSpecies(
130  std::vector<int>& species, std::vector<int>& species_surf,
131  std::string& str_chem_species,
132  const Mutation::Utilities::IO::XmlElement& node_reaction,
133  const Mutation::Thermodynamics::Thermodynamics& thermo,
134  const SurfaceState& surf_state){
135 
136  // State-Machine states for parsing a species formula
137  enum ParseState {
138  coefficient,
139  name,
140  plus
141  } state = coefficient;
142 
143  size_t c = 0;
144  size_t s = 0;
145  size_t e = 0;
146  int nu = 1;
147  bool add_species = false;
148 
149  Mutation::Utilities::String::eraseAll(str_chem_species, " ");
150 
151  // Loop over every character
152  while (c != str_chem_species.size()) {
153  switch(state) {
154  case coefficient:
155  if (isdigit(str_chem_species[c])) {
156  nu = atoi(str_chem_species.substr(c, 1).c_str());
157  s = c + 1;
158  } else {
159  nu = 1;
160  s = c;
161  }
162  state = name;
163  break;
164  case name:
165  if (str_chem_species[c] == '+')
166  state = plus;
167  break;
168  case plus:
169  if (str_chem_species[c] != '+') {
170  e = c - 2;
171  c--;
172  add_species = true;
173  state = coefficient;
174  }
175  break;
176  }
177  if (c == str_chem_species.size() - 1) {
178  add_species = true;
179  e = c;
180  }
181 
182  int index;
183  if (add_species) {
184  index = thermo.speciesIndex(
185  str_chem_species.substr(s, e-s+1));
186 
187  if (index == -1) {
188  index =
189  surf_state.surfaceProps().surfaceSpeciesIndex(
190  str_chem_species.substr(s, e-s+1));
191  }
192 
193  if(index == -1) {
194  node_reaction.parseError((
195  "Species " + str_chem_species.substr(s, e-s+1)
196  + " is not in the mixture list or a species of the "
197  "surface!" ).c_str());
198  }
199 
200  if (index < thermo.nSpecies()) {
201  for (int i_nu = 0; i_nu < nu; i_nu++)
202  species.push_back(index);
203  } else {
204  for (int i_nu = 0; i_nu < nu; i_nu++)
205  species_surf.push_back(index);
206  }
207 
208  add_species = false;
209  }
210 
211  // Move on the next character
212  c++;
213  }
214 
215  // Sort the species vector
216  std::sort(species.begin(), species.end());
217  }
218 };
219 
220 ObjectProvider<
221  GSIReactionAblation, GSIReaction>
222  ablation_reaction("ablation");
223 
224  } // namespace GasSurfaceInteraction
225 } // namespace Mutation
